description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower Rice Bowls With Greens & Sweet Chilli Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rice bowl,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Cauliflower Rice Bowls With Greens & Sweet Chilli Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt 500g Birds Eye Veggie Rice Cauliflower
1 bunch baby pak choy, halved lengthways
1 small lebanese cucumber, cut into matchsticks

recipeInstructions.text: Heal oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook cauliflower, stirring occasionally, for 3 minutes or until softened. Add garlic, ginger and half of the chilli. Cook, stirring occasionally, for4 minutes or unitl cauliflower is just starting to brown.
Bring a medium saucepan of water to the boil. Add pak choy and snow peas. Cook for 1 minute or unitl bright green and tender. Drain.
Divided cauliflower rice mixture among bowls. Top with pak choy mixture and cucumber. Sprinkle with onion, peanuts and remaing chilli. Serve with sweet chilli sauce.
